Name: Yacht Simulator VR
About the game: Yacht Simulator VR is the ultimate virtual reality yacht experience designed specifically for Virtual Reality. Explore the exterior of a modern luxury yacht or sit back and enjoy the scenery. Includes recreational activities such as basketball, frisbee, music, animal toys and a dancing babe. Have you gone yachting today?
